attributes.documentation:
@notice allows owner to change the treasury in case of hack/lost keys.
@dev Marked external because it is never called from this contract.
attributes.name: changeTreasury

attributes.documentation: @notice allows owner to change the minInvestment in case of extreme price jumps of ETH price.
attributes.name: changeMinInvestment

attributes.documentation:
@notice Called everytime we receive a contribution in ETH.
@dev Tokens are immediately transferred to the contributor, even if goal doesn't get reached.

attributes.name: tokenFallback

attributes.documentation:
@notice Burns tokens leftover from an ICO round.
@dev This can be called by anyone after deadline since it's an essential and inevitable part.
attributes.name: burnRestTokens

attributes.documentation:
@notice Called by dev to supply the address of the ICO (which is created after the PreICO)
@dev We check if `fundingGoal` is reached again, because this MIGHT be called after it is reached, so `extGoalReached()` will never be called after.
attributes.name: supplyICOContract
extGoalReached
safeWithdrawal
